definition: to abolish/to abandon/to abrogate/to discard/to depose/to oust/crippled/abandoned/waste
paper/CL:張|张[zhang1],沓[da2]/classifier for documents, letter etc

sentences.english: For imported waste paper, the voidance-ink has been studied in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文針對進口廢紙的脫墨問題進行了研究。

sentences.english: Throw all waste paper into the wastebin.
sentences.chinese: 把所有的廢紙丟進垃圾桶裏。

sentences.english: Foaming formula of PE/waste-paper composite is studied.
sentences.chinese: 對聚乙烯和廢紙複合材料發泡配方進行了研究。

sentences.english: So what does a piece littered with misspellings tell a reader?
sentences.chinese: 一張帶滿拼寫錯誤的廢紙，能告訴讀者什麼呢？

sentences.english: Neutral deinking process is more suitable to the laser printing waste paper.
sentences.chinese: 激光打印廢紙更適合採用中性脫墨工藝。

sentences.english: Do u want your balcony full of papers, broken toys, and other rubbish?
sentences.chinese: 你想自家陽臺上全是廢紙，破玩具，和垃圾嗎？

sentences.english: Xu Li, with her friends, waste paper in the park every Sunday.
sentences.chinese: 許莉和她的朋友們每個週日都去公園撿廢紙。

sentences.english: You know, I just moved my office and recycled bunch of paper.
sentences.chinese: 你知道我才換了辦公室，回收了許多的廢紙。

sentences.english: Used for pulp without breaking and coarse screen to the raw mate rials of wasted paper under the hige thickness.
sentences.chinese: 用於對廢紙原料在高濃度下進行連續碎解和粗篩選。

sentences.english: Throw the waste paper in the basket.
And, in some cases, wastepaper pulp may be blended in the furnish.
sentences.chinese: 在某些情況下，可在配料中混合一些廢紙紙漿。

sentences.english: We sort our pop cans, beer bottles and waste paper.
sentences.chinese: 我們整理易拉罐，啤酒瓶和廢紙。

sentences.english: The difficult way central order is some vernaculars , a piece of wastepaper?
sentences.chinese: 難道中央的命令是一些白話，一張廢紙？

sentences.english: Deinking is the key of recycling.
sentences.chinese: 脫墨是廢紙回用技術的關鍵。

sentences.english: B. Spit into a piece of waste paper, then put it into a garbage can.
sentences.chinese: 吐到一張廢紙上包起來，然後扔到垃圾罐中。

sentences.english: A book, tight shut, is but a block of paper.
sentences.chinese: 一本書，如果緊緊合上不讀，只是一疊廢紙。

definition: to be of no interest to anyone (idiom)
junk/items of no value/various bits and bobs
paper money/a bill (e.g. 100 yuan)/CL:張|张[zhang1],紮|扎[za1]
